details:
adjective
- socially uncomfortable
= synonyms: uneasy
- causing inconvenience
= example: causing inconvenience
- hard to deal with
= synonyms: sticky
- not elegant or graceful in expression
= example: not elegant or graceful in expression
= synonyms: inept
- lacking grace or skill in manner or movement or performance
= example: lacking grace or skill in manner or movement or performance
- difficult to handle or manage especially because of shape
= example: difficult to handle or manage especially because of shape
= synonyms: clumsy, ungainly, bunglesome
